wikipedia_page.main: David Dunlop (22 December 1859 – 3 September 1931) was a Scottish sailor and Olympic Champion. Dunlop  competed for the Royal Clyde Yacht Club at the 1908 Summer Olympics.He was a crew member of the Scottish boat Hera, which won the gold medal in the 12 metre class.
